profile.name: Emmanuel Elusie (Alonsome)
profile.bio:
Hello, I’m Emmanuel Elusie — a Backend Software Engineer, Author, and Critical Thinker dedicated to building systems that are both technically sound and intellectually intentional.

I am a self-taught developer with intensive bootcamp training from the Federal University of Technology, Owerri (FUTO), where I completed over 1200+ hours of hands-on coding and 100+ hours of professional development training. My expertise lies in designing scalable backend systems, building APIs, and solving complex problems with clean, maintainable architecture.

My technical stack includes:

Java | Spring Boot | MongoDB | SQL | Python | JavaScript | TypeScript | C/C++ | Dart

Beyond software engineering, I am also a published author of both fiction and non-fiction, with a strong inclination toward analytical reasoning, critical thinking, and free inquiry. This intellectual foundation shapes how I approach technology — not just as code, but as systems that impact people, society, and the future.

I thrive in challenging environments where innovation, clarity of thought, and technical precision are valued. My goal is to contribute to forward-thinking teams by building reliable, secure, and scalable solutions that solve real-world problems.

contact.address: Tonimas by Osisioma Ngwa LGA, Aba, Abia State, Nigeria

skills.comment: I have good knowledge of Java Backend Development and I also Learn some Framework Spring Boot and Hibernate.

skills.comment: I'm an experienced Web/App Backend Developer, so i know very well how backend end work and i know various technologies of Web/App Development.

skills.comment: I also have good knowledge of Data Structure and Algorithms and I fondly give time to improve my DSA Skills.

skills.name: Communication Skills
skills.comment: I have undertaken 100+ hours of soft skills training. And I do delibrately practice to improve my communication skills

projects.title: Java Sound Recorder System (JSRS)
projects.description: Java Sound Recorder System (JSRS) will keep the records of all sounds made by anyone which could be integrated into a social media system I'm working on. It will can also be used as an sound detection system (IDS).

projects.title: 100 Days of Code - Python Hackathon Projects
projects.description: 100 Days of Code - Python Hackathon Projects enlists all the python related projects created while undergoing a python bootcamp by Angela Yu at London App Brewery.

projects.title: Empuci AI Bot
projects.description: Empuci AI as i would prefer to reference it is a chat and communication research AI built ontop of Google Bard's API Engine that can extract texts on images using tesseract OCR Engine and respond on text like chatGPT would.

projects.title: Empuci USSD
projects.description: Empuci USSD is an Unstructured Supplementary Service Data App that gets the name of a user based on the serial number (A school project conducted soley by me).

experience.description: In Empuci Inc. I worked as a remote backend server developer and Team Operator. I completed lots of Dyanamic project there. I also learnt new skills while there which is also part of my resume.
